name: University and Quality of Life
description: This law includes advanced upgrade time gates, ecological cleanup, and hunting provisions. This law also prevent use of non-trade currencies for trade actions (contracts, work party, repair, and selling art)

properties.Title: Advanced Upgrade 2 Gate
properties.UserDescription: This article establishes a time gate to allow market to stabilize between advanced upgrades.

properties.Message: Advanced Upgrade 2 is time gated. Try again after 24 hours from mechanics releasing.

properties.Title: Advanced Upgrade 3 Gate
properties.UserDescription: This article establishes a time gate to allow market to stabilize between advanced upgrades.

properties.Message: Advanced Upgrade 3 is time gated. Try again after 48 hours from mechanics releasing.

properties.Title: Advanced Upgrade 4 Gate
properties.UserDescription: This article establishes a time gate to allow market to stabilize between advanced upgrades.

properties.Message: Advanced Upgrade 4 is time gated. Try again after 72 hours from mechanics releasing.

Left.contextDescription: A value of 100 represents a fully grown tree, 0 represents a newly-planted seed.

Citizen.contextDescription: The citizen who chopped down the tree that is generating debris.

RightNumber.contextDescription: The number of debris blocks created in this action.

Target.contextDescription: The citizen who chopped down the tree that is generating debris.

RightNumber.contextDescription: The number of debris blocks created in this action.

Citizen.contextDescription: The citizen who chopped down the tree that is generating debris.

properties.Title: hunting Law
properties.UserDescription: This article allows you to hunt anywhere. You may opt out of this on your personal property if you do not wish for people to hunt on your lands.

properties.Title: Magistrate Judge and Prosecutor Permissions
properties.UserDescription: This article gives the Magistrate Judge and Prosecutor permissions to post court summons.
